articles.title: Singapore Struggles to Reopen After Vaccinations - The New York Times
articles.description: Singapore’s experience offers lessons for other countries that want to reduce pandemic restrictions but have yet to deal with widespread infections.
articles.content: Angeline Ng,a marketing manager,said this year was tougher than the last. Before her father died in May, she had to navigate the strict visitor limits in the hospital, which was emotionally taxing. I… [+3076 chars]
